tweet:

image_prompt: Dynamic pixel art scene. Cute round bee mascot with pink cheeks floating in center, surrounded by glowing floating icons of a camera, a paintbrush, and a waveform. Lime green #ecf874 and soft pastel purple background. High energy, magical sparkles, 'LEVEL UP' text in pixel font. Cozy 8-bit aesthetic, warm lighting, chunky retro sprites.
reasoning: Directly addresses the major value add (SOTA models) with a builder-first 'ship it' attitude. Shows technical momentum without corporate fluff.
